meanings.sent1: The unwonted snowfall in April surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her unwonted behavior at the party raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unwonted decision to take a bath left its owner baffled.
meanings.sent4: The unwonted silence in the bustling city felt eerie and unsettling.
meanings.sent5: The unwonted sight of a rainbow at midnight was truly magical.

meanings.sent1: The unwonted taste of the exotic fruit intrigued her taste buds.
meanings.sent2: He felt unwonted excitement as he stepped into the foreign land.
meanings.sent3: The unwonted sound of laughter coming from the library puzzled the students.
meanings.sent4: Her unwonted courage to speak up in class surprised her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The unwonted smell of spices in the air transported him to a distant land.
